text: Mugɨluŋ Susɨ dɨ aŋam ulaŋ agaŋ haiabɨla agadɨ lua muji ma hɨniadami. Nɨbu lua muji agadɨ vala ivave haiabɨla heŋ hɨniadami. Heŋ hɨnidaci mugɨluŋ Susɨ saŋ sagalɨ igu igu hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ agaŋ sabaŋ bulɨmakau agɨladɨ viavɨla akuaba akuaba fu hajɨŋ sɨvilavɨmi agɨladɨ viavɨla haiabɨla agadɨ lua hɨbɨ heŋ ivavemi. Ivavevɨla hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ hula hafalavɨla Polɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ sagalɨ iguben aba lɨhavɨmi. Banabasɨ dɨ ibi avi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ sagalɨ iguben aba lɨhavɨmi.
